April 1, 1973 D Blackpool Contest (C Section)
Blackpool Contest (C Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-c-section
Norbreck Hydro Hotel, Blackpool, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £12, 3rd £6. 22nd annual contest. 9 bands competed.
Dec. 24, 2014, 3:15 p.m. Dec. 17, 2016, 12:01 a.m.
1 North Ashton Prize Leslie Naylor Swedish Rhapsody
2 Parr (St. Helens) Band Bob Kerwick Themes from the First Symphony [Beethoven]
3 Grange Moor Brass Band G. Field Rhapsody in Brass
Unknown Result Blackpool Brass John Victor Ayling
